value.original: The Link Column indicates which column is the primary key for those situations where there is more than one parent. Only define it, if the table has more than one parent column (e.g. AD_User_Roles).

row.value: Основната колона показва коя колона в основния ключ за ситуациите, където има повече от един ключ.

value.original: Language for this Business Partner if Multi-Language enabled

row.value: Езика за този партньор, ако е включена настройката 'Много-Езиков'

value.original: The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting documents. It requires, that on Client level, Multi-Lingual documents are selected and that you have created/loaded the language.

row.value: The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting documents. It requires, that on Client level, Multi-Lingual documents are selected and that you have created/loaded the language.

value.original: The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.

row.value: The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.

value.original: Tax Amount for Credit Card transaction
The Tax Amount displays the total tax amount. The tax amount is only used for credit card processing.

row.value: Данъчния размер показва крайния размер. Размера на данъка се използва само за разплащане с кредитни карти.
Ограничи приемането само на тази валута

value.original: The Only Currency field indicates that this bank account accepts only the currency identified here.

row.value: Полето за валутата показва че тази банка приема само въведената валута.

value.original: Identifies a Business Partner (Sales Rep) receiving the Commission

row.value: Покава каква комисионната взима Бизнес партьора

value.original: The Business Partner should be a vendor and may be a Sales Representative

row.value: Бизнес партьора трябва да е доставчик или продажбен представител

value.original: The Acknowledged checkbox indicates if this notice does not need to be retained.

row.value: Отметката за потвърждение покава, дали тази бележка няма нужда от задържане.

value.original: Column which controls all tabs in the workbench

row.value: Column which controls all tabs in the workbench

value.original: Name your Adempiere System installation, e.g. Joe Block, Inc.

row.value: Name your Compiere System installation, e.g. Joe Block, Inc.

value.original: The name if the system to differentiate support contracts

row.value: The name if the system to differentiate support contracts

value.original: The values of the actual Product Attributes. Product Instance attributes are defined in the actual transactions.

row.value: The values of the actual Product Attributes. Product Instance attributes are defined in the actual transactions.

value.original: Document sequence number of the document

The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

row.value:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

value.original: Overwrite the account segment Project with the value specified

row.value: Overwrite the account segment Project with the value specified

value.original: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

row.value: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.
